class Solution(object):
    def minChanges(self, nums, k):
        """
        :type nums: List[int]
        :type k: int
        :rtype: int
        """
        n = len(nums)
        diffs = [0]*(k+1)
        maxdiffonechange = [0]*(k+1)
        for i in xrange(n/2):
            d = abs(nums[i]-nums[n-i-1])
            diffs[d] += 1
            D = max(nums[i],k-nums[i],nums[n-i-1],k-nums[n-i-1])
            maxdiffonechange[D] += 1

        minchanges = n
        cumsum = 0
        for d in xrange(0,k+1):
            minchanges = min(minchanges,n/2-diffs[d]+cumsum)
            cumsum += maxdiffonechange[d]
        return minchanges
